summary:
Books on back, smaller books on waist/lower back, Scroll pouch and Quiver.
Check these out!
descriptionHtml:
ALL THE ITEMS ARE CRAFTABLE AT SKYFORGE! 
NOW THERE IS PERK REQUIREMENTS FOR EACH BOOK!
MPORTANT! RELATED TO THE ARMOR SHOWN ON THE PICTURES!
That armor is \"Oblivionwalker Robe\" I am working on.
It\'s pretty much completed, but I need to link it to Dawnguard before I can upload it.
And I can\'t do this before CK has been updated. (I heard a rumor that the update is going to be released on Monday)

I\'ve been modding for some time, but for the first time I created mod which I can publish into workshop. (No stuff used from other authors and so)

I thought the idea is pretty nice and original, and I haven\'t seen anything like this on Nexus or in Workshop so I wanted to publish this. 
This mod is a collection of some of the ideas I got when played Skyrim.

Basically this mod adds big books that can be carried on your back, couple of scroll quivers (Big and small), smaller books which are positioned on lower back and slightly tilted, and wearable weapons (just a couple atm) and in future maybe something more unique.

ALL THE ITEMS ARE CRAFTABLE AT SKYFORGE! 
NOW THERE IS PERK REQUIREMENTS FOR EACH BOOK!
I AM NOT GOING TO INCLUDE ALL THE RECIPES HERE, GET THE PROPER PERK AND CHECK THEM YOURSELF AT THE FORGE! (To be honest, recipes will just clutter up description, and in my opinion it’s messy enough already)

Here\'s the current Equipment:
WEARABLE BOOKS, note that requirements are same for big and small book, recipes may vary.

Conjuronomicon, REQUIRES ADEPT CONJURATION PERK
Fortify conjuration 10%, regenerate magicka 30% faster, conjurations last 20% longer, -30% health and stamina regeneration

Great Book of Destruction, REQUIRES EXPERT DESTRUCTION PERK
Dagon\'s Wrath, Fortifies destruction spells by 10%, but makes you 10% more vulnerable to magic.
Also increases magicka by 30.

Book of the Dragonborn, REQUIRED THAT PLAYER HAS UNRELENTING FORCE SHOUT
Similiar effect to amulet of Talos. Reduces shout recovery time. Works with amulet for greater effect, however reduces stamina regen rate by 25%. It must be exhausting to shout all the time.

Healer\'s Book, REQUIRES PERK APPRENTICE RESTORATION
Restoration spells are 15% more effective and health regeneration rate by 35%. No negative effects. 

Illusion Book, REQUIRES ADEPT ILLUSION PERK
Illusion spells are 20% more powerful (Though I am not sure what it means. Spells affect higher level enemies? Maybe.)
Fortify magicka rate 30%, No negative effects. (30% ain’t huge at later levels, and I have no idea if 20% better illusion spells actually affect at all.)
Alteration Book, REQUIRES ADEPT ALTERATION
Fortifies armor rating by 45 (Enchantment, works with mage armors), Alteration spells last 15% longer, health regeneration reduced by 35%
Wearable Elder Scroll REQUIRES THAT THE PLAYER HAS “DRAGONREND- SHOUT”
Increases magicka by 50, Armor rating by 50, Magicka rate 25% and reduces HP regeneration by 50%, Couldn’t think of anything more unique for this one.

Big and Small Scroll Bag, these serve as fine base for your own enchantments, don’t you think? REQUIRES THE PERK WHICH REQUIRES ENCHANTING OF 20 

WEARABLE Mehrune’s Razor, Requires the real dagger now and it can be crafted back to weapon. 
Increases destruction spell damage by 10% and makes you immune to poison.

Wearable Chillrend, TESTING! You should be able to make it if you have Chillrend Equipped, I am not sure if it works on every version of chillrend. (Chillrend is leveled weapon, and there is 7 different versions of it, so it’s not miracle if it does not work, but I want to test this)
Resist frost 20% and resist magic 5%, not huge deal. I’ll improve it later.
